com.example.economicaldiagram

Class AnimButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • com.example.economicaldiagram.AnimButton

  •  class AnimButton
extends SurfaceView
    Custom UI element Animated Button. To press it, user have to touch it and move his finger from right to the left. Button has a sliding animation that plays periodically.
    Since:
    android 2.3.3
    Version:
    1.00, 13.06.2013
    Author:
    careful7j
